intro: Just another person who's located on ZeroNet. Feel free to send me ZeroMail if you're interested in chatting.

post.body: I honestly found ZeroMe quite confusing. I did not know how to get this profile working as the "MoonHub" didn't seem to do anything. I gave up for awhile which seems to have given the network enough time to get everything working! It might have had something to do with enabling TOR ^_^
For anyone who sees this message: I hope you have a wonderful day :)

comment.body: I was certainly not expecting to see something like that this evening :P
I found your radio station from somewhere else. It might have still been within the ZeroNetwork though. I love that all the music you are streaming is Creative Commmons. Have a nice day. :)
@N3uronmaster: Thanks for the suggestions! I am already using MULLVAD VPN which is IMHO the best privacy-focused and inexpensive VPN. :)

@N3uronmaster: The connection speeds are absolutely perfect. There is an included "killswitch" function which will cut your internet connection if the VPN's connection drops. This will prevent exposing your identity.
@编号0527: I am presently forcing TOR connection through ZeroNet. It certainly works better than TOR hidden services.
Wow that is some amazing art. I love it and I am not really an artsy type :P
@Gggff: I am sorry if I have offended you...I recently lost my wife and I have been very lonely without her....
I love this image. Anime is not a genre that I watch these days, but your image triggered some wonderful memories!
